short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Autofill social links and user info in Lever & Greenhouse

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Autofill your social media links, along with your information such as race, gender, veteran status, disability status, etc. on Lever and Greenhouse.

Why?
As I've been looking to apply to jobs, I noticed that I was manually filling in these redundant fields. My LinkedIn, my GitHub, my portfolio, along with some other basic information. So to combat that and to speed up the submitting the application process, I quickly built Jobsnag.

Open Sourced
Jobsnag is open source, so you can look at everything from how the logic works to how the data is being stored, etc. (using Chrome's API so nothing that you add here goes to any database or anything).
